name: xquant
short_description: Label-free quantitative proteomics has achieved high resolution and accuracy solution for large-scale LC-MS/MS data. XQuant implemented an effecient, transplantable and incorporable command line tool for label-free quantitive analysis. Wide range of search result types supported, equal accuracy to repeability to IDEAL-Q and MaxQuant and easy to use and incorporated will make XQuant an excellent tool for label-free quantitative proteomics.
summary: A command line tool for quantitive analysis of LC-MS/MS label-free dat
